law.text: Benefits shall be considered due and payable under this chapter only to the extent provided in this chapter and to the extent that money is available therefor to the credit of the unemployment insurance fund, and neither this state, the secretary, nor the cabinet shall be liable for any amount in excess of such sums.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 104. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4748g-18.
